block.p: Ilona Theodora Rand, the daughter of Dr. Elizabeth H. Rand and Dr. Richard A. Rand of Tuscaloosa, Ala., was married yesterday to William Joseph Dotson Jr., the son of Connie and William Dotson of Littleton, Colo. The Rev. Terence L. Elsberry officiated at St. Matthew's Episcopal Church in Bedford, N.Y.

The bride, 30, is known as Theo. She graduated from Smith College and received an M.B.A. in June from Harvard University. Her parents work at the University of Alabama in Tuscaloosa; her father is an associate professor of English and her mother is the chairwoman of the psychiatry and neurology department in the medical school.

Ilona Theodora Rand, the daughter of Dr. Elizabeth H. Rand and Dr. Richard A. Rand of Tuscaloosa, Ala., was married yesterday to William Joseph Dotson Jr., the son of Connie and William Dotson of Littleton, Colo. The Rev. Terence L. Elsberry officiated at St. Matthew's Episcopal Church in Bedford, N.Y.

The bride, 30, is known as Theo. She graduated from Smith College and received an M.B.A. in June from Harvard University. Her parents work at the University of Alabama in Tuscaloosa; her father is an associate professor of English and her mother is the chairwoman of the psychiatry and neurology department in the medical school.

The bridegroom, also 30, is a vice president for mergers and acquisitions at Morgan Stanley Dean Witter in New York. He graduated summa cum laude from Georgetown University. His mother teaches mathematics at Heritage High School in Littleton. His father is a senior vice president at the Gates Rubber Company in Denver.
